mapper.select: SELECT AC.ID, AC.NAME, AC.USERNAME, AC.PASSWORD, AC.PHONE, AC.WEIBO, PO.CODE AS p_code, PO.NAME AS p_name, DE.CODE AS d_code, DE.NAME AS d_name FROM ACCOUNT AC LEFT JOIN POSITION PO ON AC.POSTION = PO.CODE LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT DE ON AC.DEPARTMENT_CODE = DE.CODE WHERE ID = #{id}
